title: An apology to my teammates.
body:
I'd just like to openly say sorry to my teammates for my leave about half an hour ago.  I had a power outage at my house; it was less than a second long but that was enough to seal the game.  It wasn't intentional, and I'm really sorry to have ruined your experience, intentional or no.

At least it wasn't the lightning strike across the road as was the cause of my only leave last year.  Karthus ult too strong.

replies.body: So add them and tell them? Chances are they will never see this.
ehrn you log out/dc your "recently played" dissapears, and i'd assume OP doesn't know how to check his match history, or is too lazy :)
